scripts.build: npm run gm && npm run build-app && npm run build-api
scripts.mail-server-config: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/TeamSKP.Portal "Smtp:Port" "2500" &&  dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/TeamSKP.Portal "Smtp:Host" "127.0.0.1" && dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/TeamSKP.Portal "Smtp:EnableEmails" "true"

scripts.mail-recreate: npm run mail-rm && npm run mail-create
scripts.set-user-secrets: npm run mail-server-config && npm run db-connection-string
scripts.db-connection-string: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/TeamSKP.Portal "ConnectionStrings:ApplicationDB" "Server=127.0.0.1; Initial Catalog=TeamSKP; User ID=sa; Password=Bigs3cRet; TrustServerCertificate=true"
scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-rm && npm run db-create
scripts.db-rm: npm run db-stop && docker rm TeamSKP
scripts.db-initialize: docker exec -it TeamSKP /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Bigs3cRet -Q "CREATE DATABASE TeamSKP;ALTER DATABASE TeamSKP SET RECOVERY SIMPLE;"
scripts.db-setup: npm run db-docker && npm run eavfw-gen-migrations
scripts.db-apply-setup: npm run db-initialize && npm run eavfw-apply-migrations
